dialogue.speaker: senpai-remnants-angry
text: Not bad for an ugly worm.

dialogue.speaker: senpai-remnants-angry
text: But this time I'm gonna make you scream...

dialogue.speaker: senpai-remnants-angry
text: Almost as loud as I'll make your girlfriend scream later tonight, you fat midget.

dialogue.speaker: bf-pixel-remnants
text: Bop beep be be skdoo bep
